subscriptions.name: udsSubscription
subscriptions.onMessageReceived: message = JSON.parse(message); test['Message received is {{udsPayload}}'] = message === '{{udsPayload}}';

subscriptions.name: udsSubscription2
subscriptions.onMessageReceived: message = JSON.parse(message); test['Message received is {{udsPayload}}'] = message === '{{udsPayload}}';

publisher.name: udsPublisher2
publisher.prePublishing: test['Message to be published is {{udsPayload}}'] = publisher.payload === '{{udsPayload}}';
